question1.q: How long does a typical project take?
question1.a: Project timelines vary depending on scope and complexity, but most projects are completed within 4-12 weeks.

question2.a: We follow an agile methodology: Discovery → Design → Development → Testing → Launch → Support.

question3.a: Yes! We provide continuous support and maintenance packages to ensure your project stays up-to-date.

question4.a: We use cutting-edge technologies including React, Next.js, Node.js, Flutter, and more.

question5.q: Can you work with my existing brand?
question5.a: Absolutely! We can work within your existing brand guidelines or help you create a new identity.
